name: Dapper - Cubata Cru Shade - Bumbo
additionalNotes: Reith partnered with the folks behind Cigars Ltd. to resurrect the Cubata Cru brand, which will be getting a makeover in the coming months. The cigars were originally created at La Aurora, which is where some of Dapper’s Cubo cigars are made, so there’s that connection as well. There will be two versions, one using a shade grown wrapper and the other using a maduro, but Reith isn’t disclosing the blend.
